ONNXInference.summary: The main ONNXInference Class that handles the inference process.

Initialize.param: Path to the ONNX model, expects a path inside resources.
How many observations will the model recieve.

Run.summary: Runs the given input through the model and returns the output.
Run.param: How many different agents are creating these observations.
Run.returns: A Dictionary of arrays, containing instructions based on the observations.

Load.summary: Loads the given model into the inference process, using the best Execution provider available.
Load.param: Path to the ONNX model, expects a path inside resources.
